name: Despereaux's Escape
description:
Welcome Despereaux! Your mouse family is starving and you need a piece of cheese to feed them. Can you avoid the deadly cats and hidden traps as you navigate your way to the other mouse hole? Spoons disable traps, and you need the cheese to enter the other mouse hole, but you can only carry one item at a time so plan your movements wisely.  

Use the 'Mouse' to move your character

Holding down 'Left-Click' picks up items, and releasing 'Left Click' drops them
